Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LFM A1 R9 W8 (LFM W8 derivative with residues substitution)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=31 µM);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=257 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive bacterium S. aureus and the Gram-negative bacteria E. coli.

Literature.Title: Increased antibacterial activity of 15-residue murine lactoferricin derivatives.
